circumstances: The crew was engaged in a local training flight at RAF Boscombe Down. Shortly after takeoff, the airplane nosed up and climbed steeply to a height of 300 feet then banked right, stalled and crashed. Two crew members were killed while two others were seriously injured. The aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause: Poor flight preparation on part of the crew who did not follow the pre-departure checklist and departed with the elevators still in a lock position.
